thread.title: lee
thread.title_full: American Frame americanframe.com reviewed by lee

author: lee
title: lee
text: I find the website easy to maneuver through. I have ordered both wood and metal frames and every time they arrived in a timely manner and in excellent quality and condition. I have also ordered the Non Glare Acrylic which I am very pleased with. On one order I made a mistake on size. I wasn't able to call customer service till the next day. American Frame's customer service was very helpful in adjusting my order. I will continue to purchase future frames from American Frame.
